Name: SMUTA: Inception
About the game: SMUTA: Inception is a classic base defense. Protect the base and earn money. Hordes of enemies will try to break through the defenses. Give them a hard fight. Protect the approaches to your base, withstand several attacks using 10 types of cool weapons with the possibility of their improvements. Cybernetic zombies become stronger with each level and there are more and more of them. Think over tactics to beat off all waves of enemies. sometimes it is better to sell a tower and replace it with a more powerful one, or improve an existing one.
Meta Title: SMUTA: Inception: Jun 25, 2022, OnBlind and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on SMUTA: Inception? Check out the release date (Jun 25, 2022), developer insights from OnBlind, and a complete game summary.
